item.title: CIVILIS
item.description: We have silly situations at last. Everyone intends to make efforts every day from their respective social positions. Thus, the resulting social system was also one that efficiently spreads epidemics throughout the world. COVID-19 is the returning of SARS in 2002 in terms of the virus type, the route of transmission, and the prevention of epidemics.

item.title: CIVILIS
item.description: 間抜けなことになってしまったなあ、と思っている。 皆それぞれの立場で日々努力をしてきたつもりになってい
